fields.description: The recommended usage for clients when connecting to HS2 with Active/Passive HA configuration is via ZK service discovery URL. But some applications do not support ZK service discovery in which case they use direct URL to connect to HS2 instance. If direct connection is to passive HS2 instance, the connection should be dropped with proper error message.
fields.summary: Active/Passive HS2 HA: Disallow direct connection to passive HS2 instance

comments.body:
a short comment about the offline discussed point about connection could be created before the ha registry is initialized could be useful (hs2 transport opens before registry start will allow direct connections). also can you plz add test? TestActivePassiveHA has some tests that resolves service discovery urls to direct urls which can be extended easily to add some tests. 

looks good otherwise.
